text: @SpeakerPelosi Respectfully @SpeakerPelosi; in a bill to fight the coronavirus , why is there: funding for the Kennedy Center in Washington D.C., PBS, the National Endowment for the Arts, & NPR. Americans do not need that shit when our very lives are at stake.
